verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I stand amazed in the presence Of Jesus the Nazarene, And wonder how He could love me, A sinner, condemned, unclean.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: How marvelous! how wonderful! And my song shall ever be: How marvelous! how wonderful! Is my Savior's love for me!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: For me it was in the garden He prayed, "Not My will, but Thine;" He had no tears for His own griefs, But sweat-drops of blood for mine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: In pity angels beheld Him, And came from the world of light To comfort Him in the sorrows He bore for my soul that night. Amen.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: He took my sins and my sorrow, He made them His very own; He bore the burden to Calv'ry, And suffered, and died alone.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: When with the ransomed in glory His face I at last shall see, 'Twill be my joy thro' the ages To sing of His love for me.
